spell_tooltip.description: Reduces the cooldown of Fortifying Brew by 50%.
Douse allies in the targeted area with Nimble Brew, preventing the next full loss of control effect within 8 sec.
You perform a Mighty Ox Kick, hurling your enemy a distance behind you.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 309,681 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Targets you Roll through are snared by 40% for 5 sec.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 50,607 Nature damage or 136,874 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
After you use Transcendence: Transfer, you can use Transcendence: Transfer again within 10 sec, ignoring its cooldown.

Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 152,886 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Grants Shuffle for 5 sec and reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 3 sec.

Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Instantly heals you for 25% of the damage cleared.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 302,637.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 306,331.
Purify 5% of your Staggered damage each time you gain 3 sec of Shuffle duration.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.
Summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 137,457 Physical damage over 7.8 sec to all enemies within 8 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Drinking from Brews has a 30% chance to coat the Monk with Celestial Flames for 6 sec.

While Celestial Flames is active, Spinning Crane Kick applies Breath of Fire and Breath of Fire reduces the damage affected enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 67,469 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 42,366 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's cooldown is reduced by 1 sec and its damage is reduced by 10%.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Fortifying Brew increases Stagger effectiveness by 15% while active.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Stagger is 4% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 10% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 364,355 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 28,244 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 1.0 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

Store vitality from 15% of your damage dealt and 7% of your effective healing.

For 10 sec after casting Celestial Brew your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional damage over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Expel Harm and Vivify withdraw vitality to heal for an additional 40% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 5%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Celestial Brew has 1 additional charge.
Fortifying Brew applies a Chi Cocoon, absorbing 1.4 million damage.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 25% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Purifying Brew stores 88,841 vitality, increased based on Stagger level.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 309,859 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Targets you Roll through are snared by 40% for 5 sec.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 51,917 Nature damage or 140,287 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Provoked targets move towards you at 50% increased speed.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Roll removes a snare effect once every 30 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Stagger is 4% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 10% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 364,355 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 28,244 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 0.5 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 9%. Additionally, Keg Smash cooldown is reset instantly and enemies hit by Keg Smash or Rising Sun Kick take 8% increased damage from you for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Weapons of Order calls forth Niuzao, the Black Ox to assist you for 12 sec.

Triggering a bonus attack with Press the Advantage has a chance to call forth Niuzao, the Black Ox.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 699,652 Nature damage to all enemies, and 514,066 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 67,464 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's cooldown is reduced by 1 sec and its damage is reduced by 10%.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Fortifying Brew increases Stagger effectiveness by 15% while active.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Stagger is 4% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 10% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 364,355 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 28,244 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 1.0 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Expel Harm and Vivify withdraw vitality to heal for an additional 40% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 5%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Celestial Brew has 1 additional charge.
Fortifying Brew applies a Chi Cocoon, absorbing 1.4 million damage.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 25% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Purifying Brew stores 88,841 vitality, increased based on Stagger level.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Heals the target for 1.2 million over 7.0 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 314,122 Physical damage.
Kick upwards, dealing 310,806 Physical damage.
Heals the target for 1.2 million over 7.0 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 309,954 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 312,229 Physical damage.
Grants an additional charge of Roll and Chi Torpedo.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec, duration refreshed by your melee attacks.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 723,949 Nature damage to all enemies, and 496,249 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 32,260 Nature damage to the enemy and 30,411 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 10,496 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 47,121 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 877,873 Physical damage to your primary target and 474,051 damage to all other enemies over 3.5 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Absorbs all damage taken for 10 sec, up to 50% of your maximum health, and redirects 70% of that amount to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 119,009 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.

Draws in the positive chi of all your Healing Spheres to increase the healing of Expel Harm.
Tiger Palm damage increased by 30%.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 4% and critical damage increased by 8%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 15%. When Fists of Fury deals damage, it has a 5% chance to refund 1 Chi.

Spinning Crane Kick's damage is increased by 18% for each unique target you've struck in the last 20 sec with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick. 

Stacks up to 5 times and only applies to the primary target of each effect.

Soar forward through the air at high speed for 1.5 sec.
 
If used again while active, you will land, reducing the movement speed of enemies within 8 yds by 70% for 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 216,287 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.
Increases maximum Energy by 30. Tiger Palm's Energy cost reduced by 5.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 623,290 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 229,010 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.
Touch of Death deals 20% increased damage and can be used a second time within 5 sec before its cooldown is triggered.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec with Tiger Lightning for 24,419 Nature damage.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning every 4 sec, dealing 8% of the damage you and your summons have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
